notes: Utilitarian approach: total health maximization without equity concern
Low equity concern: slight preference for health gains in worse-off groups
Moderate equity concern: standard health economics equity weighting
Moderate-high equity priority for Pacific populations based on documented health disparities
High equity priority for Indigenous populations (Māori, Aboriginal & Torres Strait Islander)
Very high equity priority for rural Indigenous populations with geographic barriers
Health disparity multiplier: 8.6 year life expectancy gap and documented access barriers
Health disparity multiplier: 7.3 year life expectancy gap and Te Tiriti obligations
Moderate health disparity multiplier for Pacific populations in Australia
Health disparity multiplier for Pacific populations in New Zealand
Geographic access penalty for rural populations with limited specialist services
